Panda App

Technical Lead

Panda App was created for budding developers, whether on a path of self-study or as part of a group or bootcamp, by providing curated resources, job search and preparation guides, and a code portfolio page to use as a starting point. My role included:

  • Initial set-up of Express Server and configuration
  • Working with external APIs (Meetup, Dice, The Muse, and Indeed) to provide content
  • Github repository manager
  • UI/UX and front-end development
  • support MySQL database integration
